All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ptolemy.actor.Actor, ptolemy.actor.Executable, ptolemy.actor.FiringsRecordable, ptolemy.actor.Initializable, ptolemy.actor.TypedActor, CTEventGenerator, CTStepSizeControlActor, ptolemy.kernel.util.Changeable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Debuggable, ptolemy.kernel.util.DebugListener, ptolemy.kernel.util.Derivable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Instantiable, ptolemy.kernel.util.ModelErrorHandler, ptolemy.kernel.util.MoMLExportable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Moveable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Nameable
public class ZeroCrossingDetector
extends LevelCrossingDetector
An event detector that converts continuous signals to discrete events when the continuous signal crosses zero. This actor is a syntactic sugar for LevelCrossDetector with level to be 0.0.
Since:
Ptolemy II 0.4
Version:
$Id: ZeroCrossingDetector.java 57040 2010-01-27 20:52:32Z cxh $
Author:
Jie Liu
See Also:
LevelCrossingDetector, Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • ZeroCrossingDetector

      public ZeroCrossingDetector​(ptolemy.kernel.CompositeEntity container, java.lang.String name) throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException, ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException
      Construct an actor in the specified container with the specified name. The name must be unique within the container or an exception is thrown. The container argument must not be null, or a NullPointerException will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      container - The subsystem that this actor is lived in
      name - The actor's name
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If the entity cannot be contained by the proposed container.
      ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException - If name coincides with an entity already in the container.
